response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, with the response wrapped in OUTPUT_TEXT tags as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an elementary school teacher, some key ways I enforce school policies and rules with students include:

- Clearly communicating expectations and consequences at the beginning of the year and reinforcing them regularly 
- Consistently following through on stated consequences for misbehavior in a fair, impartial way
- Praising and rewarding students for following rules and meeting expectations
- Modeling good behavior and respect for rules myself as a positive example 
- Stopping and addressing misbehavior immediately when I see it happen
- Partnering with parents to ensure rules are understood and followed both at school and at home
- Posting rules visibly in the classroom as reminders
- Adapting enforcement of rules as needed for individual student circumstances while still maintaining high standards
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
response.extracted:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an elementary school teacher, some key ways I enforce school policies and rules with students include:

- Clearly communicating expectations and consequences at the beginning of the year and reinforcing them regularly 
- Consistently following through on stated consequences for misbehavior in a fair, impartial way
- Praising and rewarding students for following rules and meeting expectations
- Modeling good behavior and respect for rules myself as a positive example 
- Stopping and addressing misbehavior immediately when I see it happen
- Partnering with parents to ensure rules are understood and followed both at school and at home
- Posting rules visibly in the classroom as reminders
- Adapting enforcement of rules as needed for individual student circumstances while still maintaining high standards
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
